name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dedicated Senior Unity Engineer with extensive experience in C# and Unity, I excel in developing high-performance gaming applications, optimizing memory and CPU/GPU performance, and utilizing powerful design patterns such as SOLID principles. Proficient in the **.NET** framework, I specialize in implementing **multithreading** techniques, **client-server architecture**, and **in-app purchases** to enhance user experiences. My technical toolkit includes **Unity UI**, **ECS**, **DOTS**, and **Addressables** for more efficient game development, along with strong capabilities in **analytics**, **ads integration**, and **push notifications** including integration with **Game Center** and **Google Play Games**. I am also experienced in **CI/CD** practices using **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions** alongside version control systems like **Git** and **Perforce**. Beyond my technical skills, I bring over 8 years of software engineering experience, a solid understanding of technical documentation, and fluency in English, enabling me to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
